Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Vazquez' life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]:
At some point during the outbreak, Vazquez joined a community in Ohio.
Vazquez appears near the interrogation room. 
Princess
, having been wanting to go to the bathroom for a while, walks over to him and asks him in Spanish where the bathroom is. He replies back in Spanish, and Princess becomes excited that they have working toilets and even toilet paper.
